Lines.Text: the door card is held securely in place with 5 screws .
keep in mind the door card has up to 3 wire bundles attached to it . be careful when removing it ! be prepared to support it while dealing with the wires .

Steps.Text_raw: The door card is held securely in place with 5 screws. Keep in mind the door card has up to 3 wire bundles attached to it. Be careful when removing it! Be prepared to support it while dealing with the wires.

Lines.Text: using a spudger , work off the cap of the first screw . the cap is tight ; you may need a jimmy or metal spudger .
using the flat end of a spudger , remove the airbag emblem . the emblem has clips on the top and bottom -- work carefully .

Steps.Text_raw: Using a spudger, work off the cap of the first screw. The cap is tight; you may need a jimmy or metal spudger. Using the flat end of a spudger, remove the airbag emblem. The emblem has clips on the top and bottom -- work carefully.

Lines.Text: using a t20 torx driver with extension , remove all 5 bolts .

Steps.Text_raw: Using a T20 Torx driver with extension, remove all 5 bolts.

Lines.Text: if you're working on the driver side door , remove the mirror control module . disconnect it from its wiring plug .

Steps.Text_raw: If you're working on the driver side door, remove the mirror control module. Disconnect it from its wiring plug.

Lines.Text: using a trim tool or similar , begin at the bottom of the door card and pop the card away from the door frame .
after you've released the bottom clips , work your way around .
you will need to lift the door card from the door frame in order to fully release it . be careful !

Steps.Text_raw: Using a trim tool or similar, begin at the bottom of the door card and pop the card away from the door frame. After you've released the bottom clips, work your way around. You will need to lift the door card from the door frame in order to fully release it. Be careful!

Lines.Text: disconnect the following from the door panel :

Steps.Text_raw: Disconnect the following from the door panel: Unlocking cable Speaker cable(s) Set the door panel aside.

Lines.Text: the door panel is now removed .
you will see the airbag module , vapor barrier , and other components .

Steps.Text_raw: The door panel is now removed. You will see the airbag module, vapor barrier, and other components.
